1370: Saxiardis moved to Die lange straet1.A.1 after marriage.
Got married to Walramus at age 22 in 1370.
1371: Gave birth to Reynildis in 1371 at age 23.
1372: Gave birth to Siabbo in 1372 at age 24.
1373: Gave birth to Volcwiif in 1373 at age 25.
1378: Gave birth to Kerolus in 1378 at age 30.
1381: Gave birth to Clementia in 1381 at age 33.
1382: Gave birth to Sipper in 1382 at age 34.
1383: Gave birth to Helyana in 1383 at age 35.
Lost daughter Volcwiif when Volcwiif was 11 years old.
1387: Gave birth to Amisius in 1387 at age 39.
1389: Gave birth to Marie in 1389 at age 41.
Lost daughter Reynildis when Reynildis was 19 years old.
1393: Lost son Kerolus when Kerolus was 16 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
